entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
